name: oprabbidv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))

stmt.origin: oprabbid(s0, s1, s2, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: oprabbid(s0, s1, s2, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

|- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

|- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))
-| wnf(s2, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s1, s2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

comment: Equivalent wff's yield equal operation class abstractions (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.)
